trans-unit.source: The GX Pattern List page displays all patterns. A pattern contains rendering information, such as background color, border color, hatch style, font size, etc.

seg-source.mrk: The GX Pattern List page displays all patterns.
A pattern contains rendering information, such as background color, border color, hatch style, font size, etc.

trans-unit.source: The GX Pattern properties are defined on the GX Pattern Card page. Open this page from the GX Pattern List page by clicking New to create a new GX Pattern or double-click a pattern to view or edit an existing GX Pattern.

seg-source.mrk: The GX Pattern properties are defined on the GX Pattern Card page.
Open this page from the GX Pattern List page by clicking New to create a new GX Pattern or double-click a pattern to view or edit an existing GX Pattern.

trans-unit.source: : GX Pattern Card page, General FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : GX Pattern Card page, General FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier of the GX Pattern.

seg-source.mrk: Unique identifier of the GX Pattern.

trans-unit.source: Short description of the pattern, which is only displayed in the overview information.

seg-source.mrk: Short description of the pattern, which is only displayed in the overview information.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Background FastTab determine the background settings that are used to render the inner part of displayed regions and the hatch style brush over the background.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Background FastTab determine the background settings that are used to render the inner part of displayed regions and the hatch style brush over the background.

trans-unit.source: : GX Pattern Card page, Background FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : GX Pattern Card page, Background FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the Background settings.

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables the Background settings.

trans-unit.source: Defines the brush style for the filled region. The region can be painted in a single color (Solid) or by using two colors for a gradient style.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the brush style for the filled region.
The region can be painted in a single color (Solid) or by using two colors for a gradient style.

trans-unit.source: First color used to render this pattern.

seg-source.mrk: First color used to render this pattern.

trans-unit.source: Alpha channel of the first color. This value must be in a range from 0 (complete transparency) to 255 (completely opaque).

seg-source.mrk: Alpha channel of the first color.
This value must be in a range from 0 (complete transparency) to 255 (completely opaque).

trans-unit.source: Second color used to render this pattern.

seg-source.mrk: Second color used to render this pattern.

trans-unit.source: Alpha value of the second color.

seg-source.mrk: Alpha value of the second color.

trans-unit.source: Angle that is used for the gradient direction in degrees:

seg-source.mrk: Angle that is used for the gradient direction in degrees:

trans-unit.source: Offset X Pixels / Offset Y Pixels

seg-source.mrk: Offset X Pixels / Offset Y Pixels

trans-unit.source: An additional offset of the gradient filled region; an offset can have a negative value. These fields control a horizontal (X) pattern offset and a vertical (Y) pattern offset.

seg-source.mrk: An additional offset of the gradient filled region; an offset can have a negative value.
These fields control a horizontal (X) pattern offset and a vertical (Y) pattern offset.

trans-unit.source: Offset X Relative / Offset Y Relative

seg-source.mrk: Offset X Relative / Offset Y Relative

trans-unit.source: Relative offsets use the region size to calculate a pixel offset. The values should be in a range from -1.0 to +1.0. These fields control a horizontal (X) pattern offset and a vertical (Y) pattern offset

seg-source.mrk: Relative offsets use the region size to calculate a pixel offset.
The values should be in a range from -1.0 to +1.0.
These fields control a horizontal (X) pattern offset and a vertical (Y) pattern offset

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the rendering of a hatch style brush over the background.

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables the rendering of a hatch style brush over the background.

trans-unit.source: If selected, reverses the rendering of a hatch, since the style brush consists of two different states (color and no color).

seg-source.mrk: If selected, reverses the rendering of a hatch, since the style brush consists of two different states (color and no color).

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Border FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Border FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: : GX Pattern Card page, Border FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : GX Pattern Card page, Border FastTab

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables a special border rendering pass.

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables a special border rendering pass.

trans-unit.source: Alpha value of the border color.

seg-source.mrk: Alpha value of the border color.

trans-unit.source: Width of the border in pixels. This value can be fractional.

seg-source.mrk: Width of the border in pixels.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Jobs FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Jobs FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: : GX Pattern Card page, Jobs FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : GX Pattern Card page, Jobs FastTab

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables a rounded shape when rendering jobs with this pattern.

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables a rounded shape when rendering jobs with this pattern.

trans-unit.source: Specific height (in pixels) for jobs that are rendered with this pattern. A value of zero disables this function and renders jobs in the default height.

seg-source.mrk: Specific height (in pixels) for jobs that are rendered with this pattern.
A value of zero disables this function and renders jobs in the default height.

trans-unit.source: If selected, renders no shadows for jobs with this pattern.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, renders no shadows for jobs with this pattern.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Text FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Text FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: : GX Pattern Card page, Text FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : GX Pattern Card page, Text FastTab

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the following additional text settings. If not selected, text will still be rendered (in a default way).

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables the following additional text settings.
If not selected, text will still be rendered (in a default way).

trans-unit.source: Alpha value of the text color.

seg-source.mrk: Alpha value of the text color.

trans-unit.source: Size of the text in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Size of the text in pixels.

trans-unit.source: Horizontal alignment of the text (Left, Center, or Right)

seg-source.mrk: Horizontal alignment of the text (Left, Center, or Right)

trans-unit.source: Vertical alignment of the text (Top, Center, or Bottom)

seg-source.mrk: Vertical alignment of the text (Top, Center, or Bottom)

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables rendering of a border that surrounds the text (like a glow).

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables rendering of a border that surrounds the text (like a glow).

trans-unit.source: Alpha value of the text border color.

seg-source.mrk: Alpha value of the text border color.

trans-unit.source: Width of the text border in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Width of the text border in pixels.
